Janis Stockhouse Memorial Concert

We are deeply saddened to announce the death of Janis Stockhouse on December 23, 2024. She was a beloved member of our community and will be greatly missed.

Please watch this site for more information about a memorial concert to celebrate her life and legacy. We will be posting information about plans as they come together and ways you can help out.

Other Janis Stockhouse Tributes

Celebration of Life service at Ray E. Cramer Marching Hundred Hall Bloomington, IN

Video by Duane Busick
Watch on YouTube

WFIU: Remembering Janis Stockhouse (parts 1 and 2)

WFIU's Just You and Me program in memory of Janis Stockhouse hosted by David Brent Johnson. This features a conversation with Lissa May, Rachel Caswell, Natalie Boeyink, Sara Caswell, and Thomas Wilson speaking about Ms. Stockhouse.

  • Part 1
  • Part 2

Herald-Times: Janis Stockhouse, legendary music director, mentor, dies at 69

Herald-Times article on Janis Stockhouse's passing

Strong Songs Podcast: Remembering Janis Stockhouse

A rebroadcast of a 2019 interview that Kirk Hamilton did with Janis Stockhouse about her life and career.
It also features an outro solo by BJ Cord.

The Real Deal Podcast: Ms. Janis Stockhouse, Director of Bands at Bloomington High School North (Ret.) hosted by Rick and Connor Granlund

Interview with Janis Stockhouse about her life and career recorded in the fall of 2024.
